thread.title: Person most responsible for election of Donald Trump receives standing ovation at Broadway show
thread.title_full: Person most responsible for election of Donald Trump receives standing ovation at Broadway show

author: Greg P.
title: Person most responsible for election of Donald Trump receives standing ovation at Broadway show
text:
Person most responsible for election of Donald Trump receives standing ovation at Broadway show Posted at 5:59 pm on January 8, 2017 by Greg P. 
We have another sighting of failed presidential candidate Hillary Clinton, this time at the final performance of the Broadway musical, “The Color Purple”: Hillary Clinton just arrived at final performance of @BwayColorPurple pic.twitter.com/oVn1TZalUk 
— Michael Paulson (@MichaelPaulson) January 8, 2017 HRC at the Color Purple pic.twitter.com/nE7Uh4c54y 
— Michael Barbaro (@mikiebarb) January 8, 2017 
According to the New York Times , the person most responsible for the election of Donald Trump received a “sustained standing ovation” from the crowd: 
Hillary Clinton, who has kept a relatively low public profile since losing the presidential election two months ago, on Sunday showed up at the final performance of a revival of “The Color Purple” on Broadway. 
Mrs. Clinton received a sustained standing ovation from the sold-out crowd, a response far warmer than the scattered booing and clapping that greeted the arrival of Vice President-elect Mike Pence when he attended “Hamilton,” just one block north, on Nov. 18. Mrs. Clinton was accompanied by her husband, Bill Clinton, and their daughter, Chelsea. 
Hypocrites. Why doesn’t the audience blame her for Trump’s election? Trending 'TV is muted': CBS NFL analyst Phil Simms ripped by fans for 'insufferable' commentary 
Bill Clinton was there, too, and reportedly sang along with the cast: Bill Clinton animatedly singing final song of the day here at The Color Purple. Seems to know the words. 
— Michael Barbaro (@mikiebarb) January 8, 2017 
Well at least these two seem happy with their retirement… 
***
